```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
### Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(ggpubr) 
library(broom)
library(nortest)


###Load data
load(file="CrossFell.data.prepd.rda")

### Select data for analysis

ht.data <- filter(ht.data, taxon == "Vm")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
#run Bartlett test for homogeneity of variances 
bart <- bartlett.test(height ~ year, data = ht.data)
bart$statistic
```

The data were teste for homoscedasticity (homogeneity of variances) using the Bartlett Test. The variances were not found to be homogeneous (Bartlett's K-squared = `r bart$statistic`, p = `r bart$p.value`)
